reviewText: My brother had the VHS tape of this and so decided to get the DVD for myself.  The instructions are easy to follow and sort of rock-n-roll.  So many of guitar basics are boring, but not this one!
Your first time stringing your new guitar? No problem...my son had his set up in no time...easy to understand.
This is a great book to helping you understand the basics of setting up a guitar and taking care of it.
